sentence.Network_en: Many medieval manuscripts are in majuscule script.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多中世纪的手稿都是用大字体写的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from French, from Latin majuscula (littera) 'somewhat greater (letter')

means.word_mean: 1. one of the large alphabetic characters used as the first letter in writing or printing proper names and sometimes for emphasis;

sentences.sentence: "printers once kept the type for capitals and for small letters in separate cases; capitals were kept in the upper half of the type case and so became known as upper-case letters"

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to a style of writing characterized by somewhat rounded capital letters; 4th to 8th centuries

sentences.sentence: "many medieval manuscripts are in majuscule script"
